contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of September, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tune is GRANTED. See Pa.R.Crim.P. 122(B) (defendant has a right to a counsel-filed Petition for Allowance of Appeal). Counsel is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 30 days of this order.
